caseTitle: Additional Commissioner Inland Revenue, Audit Range, Zone-I v. M/S Eden Builders Limited through Mr. Mazahir Beg, General Manager (Operations)
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE MIAN SAQIB NISAR, HCJ
tagline: Taxpayers who filed their tax returns before S. 122(2) of the Income Tax Ordinance 2001 was amended through the Finance Act 2009 would be governed by S. 122(2) as it stood before the said amendment
